summary: Summary: Highly motivated professional who listened to clients' needs and formulated tactical plans to achieve optimal results for all parties involved. Explored opportunities to elevate client loyalty and boost revenues. Was known for honesty, integrity, and a genuine passion for setting and achieving goals, while helping others do the same. Demonstrated interpersonal skills that interfaced effectively with people from diverse backgrounds. Was respected for maintaining a professional and positive demeanor.

experience.title: Manager of Finance
experience.description: Developed partnerships and implemented checks and balances to resolve financial issues, resulting in a 95% return of premium after cancellation. Managed 5,000 active accounts and 300 in collections; processed over $75,000 weekly in customer payments, $20,000 in refunds, and $40,000 in financing for new accounts. Collected on more than 40% of bad debts weekly (up 95% since assuming the role). Provided financing for 27 agents across 9 North Carolina offices. Trained 27 agents on standard operations and ethics; ensured compliance with state regulations and company policies. Communicated with 17 insurance companies to ensure policy adherence. Developed client memos and wrote policies and procedures for financing operations.

experience.title: Insurance Agent
experience.description: Wrote home and auto policies; served as liaison for clients and 17 insurance companies. Processed claims and new business applications. Trained new agents on state and federal regulations. Provided accountability and corrections for agent errors company-wide. Maintained multiple accounts in good standing; generated over $40,000 in revenue monthly from more than 80 new accounts. Rebuilt client relations after service gaps and supported key client relationships.

experience.title: Grocery Manager
experience.description: Ensured excellence in customer service; reviewed operating and financial reports; managed associate development and training. Ordered and maintained inventory; reduced overhead expenses and loss; improved merchandising for profits; conducted store walks; documented in accordance with guidelines.

experience.title: Manager
experience.description: Led a staff of 30; provided scheduling and financial review; ensured compliance with health and fire regulations. Organized staff training; hired and evaluated personnel. Oversaw food preparation, portion size, garnishing and presentation; assisted with menu planning and daily specials. Maintained sanitation records and coordinated special events and catering; supervised store operations.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Organizational Management

certifications: South Carolina Property and Casualty License
